entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
